sources.title: A Holiday to Remember | Full Christmas Movie | Heartfelt Romantic Drama | Happy Holidays
sources.description:
Returning to her South Carolina hometown reunites a recently divorced mother with her first love.
1995.  Stars: Connie Sellecca, Asia Vieira, Brenda Bazinet, Rue McClanahan

metadata.Plot: Carolyn is leaving the big city with her daughter Jordi for her childhood village, deep in the forest. She meets her former fiancÃ©, who she left at the altar several years ago. She also finds a lost boy who she wants to adopt, but Jordi is not too keen on the idea.
